name: CHAINED (Chelnoque)
description:
An experimental arcade game. Your goal is to stay alive for as long as you can.

Almost entirely controlled with mouse. Exceptions  are ESC which opens menu and Alt+Enter (switches the full screen mode).

UPD 08/10/17: Added a post jam version with a few changes.

  • Difficulty slightly decreased.
  • Additional dialogue to clarify AFFECT mechanic.
  • In ESC menu hold right or left arrow to change mouse sensitivity.
  • Tiny reward for breaking all the chains.

It is highly recommended to play the post jam  version.

Credits:

Chelnoque - programming

Gene - art

52 000 Гц - sound FX

A5 - music

Made for Ludum Dare 39 Jam.
